model.comment: Fits Atlas N Scale: SD50 SD60
Fits Atlas N Scale: B23-7, B30-7, B36-7, C628, C630, Dash8-32BW, Dash8-40B, Dash8-40BW and GP-38. Fits Atlas DCC Ready: GP-40, GP-40-2, SD-7, SD-9, SD-35, Trainmaster and U25B
Fits Atlas HO Scale: S1, S2, S3, S4
Fits Atlas N Scale: GP7 (2006+), GP9 (2006+), GP15-1, GP 30 (2006+)
Fits American Z Lines: SD70, SD70M, SD75I, SD75M, GP9, GP38-2 and more
Fits Classic N locos with split lighting board, 2 functions
Fits GP-style N locos with split lighting board, 3 functions
UK version of DP2X different pin orientation - fits Atlas vacuumcar
European 6 pin connector
Drop in decoder for Kato N-Scale Alco PA1, P42, E9A, E8/9A (ref.1332)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-Scale F3A and F7A (ref.1333)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-Scale EMD F40PH (ref.1338)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-Scale B-Units: PB1, PA-1, F3B, F7B, and E9B (ref.1339)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-Scale EMD SD40, EMD SD70MAC, EMD SD70/75M, GE C44-9W, GE AC4400W, Athearn F45 and many other locomotives (ref.1293)

Drop in decoder for Kato N-Scale EMD SD70ACe, EMD SD70M, EMD SD40-2, and GG1. (ref.1318)
No Clips version of K1D4
Drop in decoder for N-Scale Kato RS2, RSC2, SD80/90MAC, EMD 90/43MAC, Walthers RS2 and GP18 and many other locomotives (ref.1294)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-Scale NW2 (ref.1295)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-scale MP36PH Metra (ref.1414)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-scale F40PH (ref.1489)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-scale FEF-3 (ref.1556)
Drop in decoder for Kato N-Scale ACS-64 (ref.1673)
Fits Atlas N Scale: MP-15
Z-scale 4 function A format drop in with two LEDs
Fits Atlas N Scale: VO-1000
Fits Z thru light duty HO
Fits Micro Trains N Scale SW1500
